document_data.mainbody:
he Northyard was a courtyard that was located in the city of Waterdeep during the 15 century DR.
The Northyard was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Field Ward. It sat along the High Road where it passed into Waterdeep through the North Gate. Slipgate Street branched off the southwestern section of the Northyard and Leanwall Alley connected with the eastern side.
